NAME
  ubertooth-scan - device scan and inquiry supported by Ubertooth

SYNOPSIS
  ubertooth-scan [options]


OPTIONS
  -h   help
  -U<0-7>   set ubertooth device to use
  -s   hci Scan - perform HCI scan
  -t <s>     scan Time (seconds) - length of time to sniff packets. [Default: 20s]
  -x   eXtended scan - retrieve additional information about target devices
  -b   Bluetooth device (hci0)
